text: Lokanno! Apalya palanakartyace bhaya rakha ani tya divasace bhaya theva, jya divasi pita apalya putrala kasalahi labha pohacavu sakanara nahi ani na putra apalya pityasa kincitahi labha pohacavinara asela. Laksata theva! Allahaca vayada sacca ahe. Paha! Tumhala aihika jivanane dhokyata taku naye ani na dhokebaja (saitana) ne tumhala dhokyata takave
